title: Top Floor 1BR 1BA Apartment in Westwood +Parking/Kitchen Appliances
neighborhood: Westwood, UCLA, Brentwood, West LA, Beverly Hills
posting_body: ['North Facing Top Floor 1 Bedroom 1 Bath Penthouse Apartment.', 'Prime Westwood!', '1400 Midvale Avenue', 'Westwood, Los Angeles, CA 90024', 'This bright top floor 1 bedroom penthouse apartment is north facing, with hardwood floors in the living room, carpeted bedroom, features include central air/heat, a cozy fireplace, and a private balcony.', 'Double-glazed window in the bedroom, with lots of light and views overlooking Westwood Village.', "We're located minutes away to all popular Westside destinations including Armand Hammer Museum of Art & Cultural Center, UCLA, Getty Museum, Geffen Playhouse, Wadsworth Theatre.", 'Fabulous restaurants and shopping, movie theatres, world class yoga, and public transportation are all at your fingertips.', 'Kitchen is equipped with a microwave, a dishwasher, a gas stove/oven and a refrigerator.', 'Community features include covered parking, an elevator, a garage, fitness center, a laundry facility, and a swimming pool on the roof of our community.', 'Parking included and extra storage available.', 'For appointment to see this apartment or for questions, call us today at', 'show contact info', 'or visit <URL>.', 'This top floor 1 bedroom penthouse apartment offers the following features:', 'Double-Glazed Window', 'Lots of Light', 'Gas Stove/Oven', 'Disability Access', 'Refrigerator', 'Cable Ready', 'Dishwasher', 'Private Balcony', 'Cozy Gas Fireplace', 'Hardwood Floors', 'Central Air/Heating', 'Community Amenities:', 'Lounge', 'Spa', 'Roof Terrace', 'BBQ/Grill Area', 'Pool', 'Laundry Facilities', 'Sauna', 'Controlled Access', 'Assigned Parking', 'Elevator', 'Fitness Center', 'Disclaimer: Pictures are a representation but may not be of the exact apartment.', 'Advertised unit availability, rental rates, and terms are updated every 24 hours and conditions are subject to change without notice.', 'Please call for latest availability details.']
